name: 2B (2 BE or NOT 2 BE)
description:
Controllers:
[ MOUSE ] - User Interface & Buttons
[ LEFT CLICK  /  TAP ] - Bless Peasant

King! The peasants need you NOW!

Help them build a powerful discrimination-free village.

Bless the peasants by their appearance: cloth, wealth, hair, eyes, and skin color.

"2 BE or NOT 2 BE" invites you to take a challenge, check your pre-judging senses, and collect and build a robust, colorful, optimistic, fair village.

Challenge your friends,  and break the world's biggest village record.

I challenge you to experience it or even become our coffee machine gun.

All donations will support the near development of new gaming experiences
and are shared among contributors.

Stay in touch & support... 🔫 ☕ ;)

Join our exclusive Discord community (25 invites):
https://discord.gg/qnq2NJVWdJ
